definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

sentences.english: The avocado shows a typical loss of green color and a reduction in vegetative growth.
sentences.chinese: 鳄梨呈现典型的叶色褪绿及营养生长减弱。

sentences.english: The discomfort subsides gradually over one or two weeks, leaving the joint apparently normal, and pain-free.
sentences.chinese: 不适感会在一到两周内逐渐减弱，直到关节恢复正常。

sentences.english: The cicada is stilled. The chorus of the cricket and katydid diminishes.
sentences.chinese: 秋蝉安静下来，蟋蟀和蚱蜢的合唱声减弱。

sentences.english: The wind blew hard all night but let up at daybreak .
sentences.chinese: 整个晚上风刮很厉害，但到破晓时风势减弱了。

sentences.english: MVC decouples views and models by establishing a subscribe/notify protocol between them.
sentences.chinese: 通过视图和模型之间的协议，MVC减弱了它们。

sentences.english: The reduced wind shear means that upper-level winds are less likely to disrupt hurricane formation.
sentences.chinese: 减弱风切变意味着高空风不太可能影响飓风的形成。

sentences.english: Brazil's carnival spirit has flagged of late.
sentences.chinese: 巴西的狂欢心情最近有所减弱。

sentences.english: As temperatures rise, or the advent of strong cold air will gradually weaken.
sentences.chinese: 随着气温回升或者强冷空气来临会逐渐减弱。

sentences.english: The pathogenicity of hypha and spore was weakened.
sentences.chinese: 菌丝和分生孢子致病性减弱。

sentences.english: With the increasing of the age, the appetite would slough.
sentences.chinese: 随着年龄的增长，人的食欲就会减弱。

sentences.english: Such a frugal mind-set could take the edge off any recovery.
sentences.chinese: 而这样的节约心态将会减弱复苏进度。

sentences.english: The wind has slackened off now.
Her defenses will wear down after a few weeks in prison.
sentences.chinese: 在监狱呆几星期之后，她的防卫力将会减弱。

sentences.english: A pale gleam of tempered sunlight fell through the leaves.
sentences.chinese: 威力减弱的暗淡阳光从树叶间洒下来。

sentences.english: The diabatic heating decreased when the vortex moving away from the plateau.
sentences.chinese: 当低涡远离高原后，非绝热加热减弱。

sentences.english: FITOW moved WNW in the past 24 hours with slight weakening.
sentences.chinese: 菲特于过去24小时向西北偏西移动并稍为减弱。

definition: to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to make heavier/to emphasize/(of an illness etc) to become more serious/to aggravate (a bad situation)/to increase (a burden, punishment etc)
